pages.md:
# Advanced Filters

Take photos with filter effects.

1. Press the **DRIVE/DELETE** button and select **Adv. > ADVANCED FILTER** in the drive-mode menu.

   !Drive/Delete Button

2. Choose a filter.

3. Take photographs.
